Reviews.Title: Best phone I have ever own
Reviews.Author: V.Q.M
Reviews.Content: First of all I love this phone because because of the long battery life.  I can talk on it for hours and still have more than 1/2 of the charge left on the phone. I can go for days without charging after a full charge. The pictures turn out great for such a simple phone.  And the only reason I have this phone is to talk and sometimes text :) While other fancy phone users I.e IPhone users are looking for a outlet to charge their phone for an important call so they can talk.... I  just smile and think I love my simple little phone. By the way I bought an extra phone since ATT doesn't sell them anymore.

Reviews.Title: Gret phone
Reviews.Author: R. Edwards "wildlife photographer"
Reviews.Content: I seldom if ever need internet access from my phone, I do however talk and text, this phone is ideal. You can access internet for things like ringtones, gps, music downloads etc. It is small, easily fitting in a pocket and looks great. If you just want a phone, with minimal internet use, this phone is perfect.

Reviews.Title: I like plain phones
Reviews.Author: Naomi Maggiora "Texas yellow rose"
Reviews.Content: After I accidentally washed my phone, I searched for another one like it. I don't text or want a data plan, so finding one I liked was almost impossible. BUT Amazon came through again. I found my exact phone and received it the next day.. Happy camper I am.Thanks, Amazon

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: ray
Reviews.Content: I purchase this phone for my dad, so far he like it. No complain so far, this phone is good for someone who don't really want all the modern features on a phone. Just easy to use..

Reviews.Title: Phone display is damaged
Reviews.Author: Yugandhar Guntaka
Reviews.Content: The LCD display on the cover has a vertical burnt white line right in the middle.Bought this as a gift to a family member abroad and felt embarrassed when this turned out to be a defective equipment.I could not bring it back to return it, as there is no way for me to send the replacement overseas again.With the trust I had in Amazon's fulfillment, I did not even power this device up before gifting it. Didn't want to open the packaging.I wish the seller had mentioned it was defective.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone...
Reviews.Author: D. Isbell
Reviews.Content: ...this is not the state-of-the-art smart phone, but if you want a good serviceable phone with a number of options it really works out very well...biggest advantage is it doesn't have a touch screen that locks on you everytime you try to use it or switches you to an app you didn't want to go to...this is a you-fly-it dependable phone...

Reviews.Title: replacement phone
Reviews.Author: sueice
Reviews.Content: this is the same phone I had previously, but it started to break down after several years.  I did not want to upgrade my phone with ATT and sign a new extended contact, so was very happy to buy this ( I already knew that my  memory cards, extra cords, and headphones would work) and was happy not to spend any more money with a product I was familiar with.  The fact that the phone was brand new really was what made me buy - I have not been pleased with "used' phones in the past

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: Jose Poleo
Reviews.Content: PRODUCTO ES EXCELENTE LO RECOMIENDO AMPLIAMENTE GRACIAS POR SUS SERVICIOS Y LES DESEO LO MEJOR EN SUS VENTAS SIEMPRE GRACIAS

Reviews.Title: Did not work
Reviews.Author: Anna King
Reviews.Content: I would neve order from this company.  It said the phone was new, but is did not work.  Would give it a negative star if that were a posibility.Will be returning immediately

Reviews.Title: 50/50 chance
Reviews.Author: adboble
Reviews.Content: I am so disappointed the phone I ordered came defective. It doesn't turn on, even if I connect the phone to the charger. The unit I've received seems to be REFURBISHED because it came in an unsealed generic looking box and the battery is definitely not original Sony Ericsson. I've sent the unit back and ordered from another seller. The second unit is working well and it came in an AT&T; box with manual, charger, battery, and back cover. Call quality on phone is just fine, I can hear other line clear. Speaker is adequate. Pictures from camera is so so specially without flash. Mp3 songs must be trimmed to be usable as ringtones.

Reviews.Title: Not unlocked
Reviews.Author: lucian303
Reviews.Content: The phone's not unlocked and can't send MMS. Not as advertised. I would never buy it again. Never ever ever.

Reviews.Title: Not good. I dont recomend
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: Looks like refurbished piece. Sd card Slot finish was with repair. My phone has starting problems. I don't recommend buying here since quality is poor.

Reviews.Title: it was locked
Reviews.Author: Jason X
Reviews.Content: i purchased this phone believing it was as it says "UNLOCKED" but to my surprise it was locked i had to pay someone US$20.00(19.85) to have dumb phone unlocked i was going to return it but it was a present for someone and the time was too short so i would not ever recommend this product to anyone

Reviews.Title: Very nice phone
Reviews.Author: Betty Boop
Reviews.Content: The phone was a gift for a friend; she says she loved it, all the features and how easy it is to navigate.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: pretty good
Reviews.Author: JJ
Reviews.Content: reviews were iffy and it was a risk to buy but I am satisfied- no problems.  The data space is not as large as I would like so I lost some numbers in the transfer and lots of texts msgs so back your phone and print everything out before you make the transfer

Reviews.Title: Shuts off unexpectedly
Reviews.Author: Tatiana Shurpyak
Reviews.Content: The phone is quite nice (I've been a fan of SonyEricsson for years), it is almost the same I had before - SE w508.It is unlocked, works outside of US as well.Unfortunately, it often shuts down with no reason. It is really annoying. I am trying to save contact, read SMS, or even answer a call.. then need some time to switch it back on..However, quite beautiful an cute.Comes with charger and nothing else. AT&T; menus and signs.

Reviews.Title: it was a problem from the beginning
Reviews.Author: m954el forrest
Reviews.Content: we ordered 2 of them and had problems with both we went to 4 ddifferent t mobile stores and none of them could get either of them working properley

Reviews.Title: Sony Ericsson Locked
Reviews.Author: Maristela Bhering Zottis
Reviews.Content: Sony Ericsson Walkman W518a Unlocked GSM Phone with 3.2MP Camera, GPS and Bluetooth - RedI bought a Sony Ericsson mobile phone at 11/27/2012 how  unlocked  but this device is locked. I need the unlocked code to use it. Can you help me with this code?

Reviews.Title: My cell
Reviews.Author: Natalie Orellana
Reviews.Content: Just like my last one but red. If you liked it once you will like it again. yep yep yep

Reviews.Title: nice cell
Reviews.Author: Cristian
Reviews.Content: the phone is working fine, easy to handle, fast shipping.I recommend these products who needs a good cell phone.thank you

Reviews.Title: WTF!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Kevin Whiskey
Reviews.Content: this phone does not wrk one min its comin on the next thing u now it cut off again first i thought it was  the battery but its not.i paid  $60 US for this and i want back my money or send me back one that is workin good

Reviews.Title: Sony Ericsson Walkman W518a Unlocked GSM Phone with 3.2MP Camera, GPS and Bluetooth - Red
Reviews.Author: stormin norman
Reviews.Content: The phone is ok, you have to have a special card to load music in the phone the MP3 card will not work, the one that is used in all other phones,

Reviews.Title: Wasted Money
Reviews.Author: Roger Raby
Reviews.Content: Allegedly this is supposed to be a GSM Phone,my Tmobile card would not workI'm not happy at all........Should have known better.....

Reviews.Title: :) hi
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: Is a good phone guys ...... Tanks. :) ... Some body stolen me this phone .. So that's why I buy this phone again .......
